name: Under Brush (WIP)
description:
== ALPHA (Prototype) BUILD ==

I have decided to do things backwards this time.  I will start with the Itch Page and post updates here of my Progress.  Also, for $1.00 USD you will be able to get early access to Development Builds along the way.  This should be fun!  I really want a Pixel Survival Game!

GAME OVERVIEW:
  • A Pixel Art, Survival, Foraging, Farming Game
  • 2D
  • 3/4 View
GAME FEATURES: (DESIRED) 
  • Health, Hunger, Thirst, Temperature, Energy, Happiness Levels
  • Simple Inventory System
  • Non-Combat Game
  • No Harm to Animals
  • Harvest Items (Trees, Rocks, Plants etc)
  • Build, Place & Upgrade Items (Shelter, Workbench, Anvil, Stove, Campfire, etc)
  • Place Farming Areas (Can Plant Seeds - Collect Food)
  • Tool Upgrading (4 Levels)
  • Backpack Upgrade (4 Levels)
  • Water Purification
  • Minimal Crafting
  • Resting
  • Large World to Explore (Possibly Procedural)
  • Death from Environment (Exposure, Starvation, Thirst)
  • Day/Year Counter
  • Temperature (Hot & Cold)
  • Soundtrack (Music)
  • Sound Effects (Hand Made Foley)
  • Auto-Save (and Manual Save)

Please provide feedback or thoughts below in the Message Board...
